WorkItem.Description:
Hello!
I think it would be better to replace all "return new Error" with "throw new Error" in getError function here: https://xrmservicetoolkit.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#XrmServiceTookit/Scripts/helper/XrmServiceToolkit.js
Because when you call this function in doRequest, returned value is not used.
Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: Returned value of getError is never used  in XrmServiceToolkit.js

Comments.Message:
Hi There.

Thanks for the suggestion. I have been thinking about this for a while. Will have a look and refactor the error handling logic in the next release. 

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
